module.name: default
module.build:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in hppa*-hpux*) # allow gdk-pixbuf-csource to run during the build because it # is not linked against the abs path of the shared library so # cannot be run when outside of the dir it was built in export SHLIB_PATH="${SB_BUILD_PREFIX}/gdk-pixbuf/.libs" ;; esac
gmake configexecincludedir="${_libdir}/include" \ democodedir="${_datadir}/demo" \ gdkincludedir="${_includedir}/gdk" \ gtkincludedir="${_includedir}/gtk" \ libgdk_pixbuf_xlibincludedir="${_includedir}/gdk-pixbuf-xlib" \ libgdk_pixbufincludedir="${_includedir}/gdk-pixbuf" \ libgdkincludedir="${_includedir}/gdk" \ libgtkincludedir="${_includedir}/gtk"
module.install:
gmake install configexecincludedir="${_libdir}/include" \ democodedir="${_datadir}/demo" \ gdkincludedir="${_includedir}/gdk" \ gtkincludedir="${_includedir}/gtk" \ libgdk_pixbuf_xlibincludedir="${_includedir}/gdk-pixbuf-xlib" \ libgdk_pixbufincludedir="${_includedir}/gdk-pixbuf" \ libgdkincludedir="${_includedir}/gdk" \ libgtkincludedir="${_includedir}/gtk"
${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 -d ${_sysconfdir}/gtk-2.0 ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 644 -o root -g 0 /dev/null \ ${_sysconfdir}/gtk-2.0/gtkrc

module.name: 64bit
module.script-header:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) _bindir=bin/ppc64 _libdir="lib/ppc64" ;; ia64*-hpux*) _bindir=bin/hpux64 _libdir="lib/hpux64" ;; *-hpux*) _bindir=bin/pa20_64 _libdir="lib/pa20_64" ;; *-irix*) _bindir=bin/mips4 _libdir=lib64 ;; i?86*-solaris*) _bindir=bin/amd64 _libdir="lib/amd64" ;; *-solaris*) _bindir=bin/sparcv9 _libdir="lib/sparcv9" ;; esac
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) export OBJECT_MODE=64 ;; esac
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -q64 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; ia64*-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 +Olit=all +Ofltacc +Oentrysched +DD64 \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+b," ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 +Olit=all +Ofltacc +Oentrysched +DD64 \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b,"
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-hpux11.31) ARGS="--build=hppa64-hp-hpux11.31" ;; *-hpux11.23) ARGS="--build=hppa64-hp-hpux11.23" ;; *-hpux11.11) ARGS="--build=hppa64-hp-hpux11.11" ;; *-hpux11.00) ARGS="--build=hppa64-hp-hpux11.00" ;; esac ;; *-irix*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1009,1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -64 -mips4 -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=opteron -m64 \ -xarch=sse2" CPPFLAGS="-DANSICPP" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic \ -xarch=v9" CPPFLAGS="-DANSICPP" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic -m64 \ -xarch=sparc" CPPFLAGS="-DANSICPP" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" \ CPPFLAGS="${SB_VAR_LIBPNG+-I${SB_VAR_LIBPNG_INC}} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBZ+-I${SB_VAR_LIBZ_INC}} -I${SB_VAR_JASPER_INC} \ ${SB_VAR_JPEG+-I${SB_VAR_JPEG_INC}} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBTIFF+-I${SB_VAR_LIBTIFF_INC}} \ ${CPPFLAGS+${CPPFLAGS}}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ LDFLAGS="${SB_VAR_LIBPNG+-L${SB_VAR_LIBPNG}/${_libdir}} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBZ+-L${SB_VAR_LIBZ}/${_libdir}} \ -L${SB_VAR_JASPER}/${_libdir} \ ${SB_VAR_JPEG+-L${SB_VAR_JPEG}/${_libdir}} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBTIFF+-L${SB_VAR_LIBTIFF}/${_libdir}} \ ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_JASPER}/${_libdir}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPNG+:${SB_VAR_LIBPNG}/${_libdir}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBZ+:${SB_VAR_LIBZ}/${_libdir}}\ ${SB_VAR_JPEG+:${SB_VAR_JPEG}/${_libdir}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTIFF+:${SB_VAR_LIBTIFF}/${_libdir}} \ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB}/${_libdir}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_JASPER}/${_libdir}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT+:${SB_VAR_GETTEXT}/${_libdir}/pkgconfig}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV}/${_libdir}/pkgconfig}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPNG+:${SB_VAR_LIBPNG}/${_libdir}/pkgconfig}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBZ+:${SB_VAR_LIBZ}/${_libdir}/pkgconfig}" \ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+--with-libiconv-prefix=${SB_VAR_LIBICONV}} \ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT+--with-libintl-prefix=${SB_VAR_GETTEXT}} \ --enable-debug=no --with-libjasper --datarootdir=${_datadir} \ --datadir=${_datadir} --sysconfdir=${_sysconfdir} \ --with-html-dir=${_docdir} --disable-gtk-doc --disable-man \ --enable-static --enable-shared --disable-dependency-tracking \ --enable-explicit-deps ${ARGS+${ARGS}} \ --bindir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${_bindir}" \ --libdir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${_libdir}" \ --mandir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man" \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ s! -L/usr/lib64!!; \ s!-L\(\${libdir}\)!-L\1 ${CC_LD_RT}\1!;" \ gdk-pixbuf-2.0.pc contrib/gdk-pixbuf-xlib/gdk-pixbuf-xlib-2.0.pc
module.build:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in hppa*-hpux*) # allow gdk-pixbuf-csource to run during the build because it # is not linked against the abs path of the shared library so # cannot be run when outside of the dir it was built in export SHLIB_PATH="${SB_BUILD_PREFIX}/gdk-pixbuf/.libs" ;; esac
gmake configexecincludedir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${_libdir}/include" \ democodedir="${_datadir}/demo" \ gdkincludedir="${_includedir}/gdk" \ gtkincludedir="${_includedir}/gtk" \ libgdk_pixbuf_xlibincludedir="${_includedir}/gdk-pixbuf-xlib" \ libgdk_pixbufincludedir="${_includedir}/gdk-pixbuf" \ libgdkincludedir="${_includedir}/gdk" \ libgtkincludedir="${_includedir}/gtk"
module.install:
if [ ! -d ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/64 ]; then case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*|*-hpux*|*-solaris*) ln -s ./$(basename ${_libdir}) ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/64 ;; *-irix*) ln -s ../lib64 ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/64 ;; esac fi
gmake install-pkgconfigDATA gmake -C gdk-pixbuf install-binPROGRAMS install-libLTLIBRARIES \ install-loaderLTLIBRARIES install-data-hook gmake -C contrib/gdk-pixbuf-xlib install-libLTLIBRARIES \ install-pkgconfigDATA
